subs.text: If the state of journalism is so bad from a business side, and if it's not serving the people very well, I wonder if we could work out some kind of deal here?

If we want even a modest reboot of blogging, as a community thing, we're going to have to start with something like blogrolls. I wrote a bit yesterday about how blogrolls came about, then weblogs.com and how that led to RSS and feed readers. This time, we don't have to wait for feeds to show up, they're already here. It should happen more quickly.
Today's song: Will The Circle Be Unbroken.
